title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
message: Got some weird anomalies on the screen with ghosting is this a display issue or logic board ?

title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
message: I know i should have checked external image but it completely slipped my mind i removed the charge port at the moment to use in another machine, Just wondering if anyone seen this before?

title: A1534 2015 Screen issue
message:
Never saw that...

External monitor will help in this case.
You can also try another USB OSX, just in case.

Do PRAM reset too.
